review_data.title: Cult bratwurst?
review_data.content: Not sure what the fuss is about. it's good but the bratwurst tastes like any other. Unfortunately they only have spicy mustard...why not have a mild mustard for people who don't like the spicy one? Service are a bit pushy on selling drinks.
